}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There are two revisions of the WG111v2. *REV1, FCC ID: PY305100001, OUI 00:0F:B5, 00:14:6C *REV2, FCC ID: PY305400026, OUI 00:18:4D, 00:1B:2F, 00:1E:2A, 00:1F:33, 00:22:3F, 00:24:B2
